com.master.datascale.projet.dao

Interface DAOInterface<T,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Object that must handle the class that extends this one
    Id - The type of Object that has the Class as Id.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDAOAnswer, IDAOQcm, IDAOQuestion, IDAOStudent, IDAOTeacher, IDAOUser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAOAnswer, DAOQcm, DAOQuestion, DAOStudent, DAOTeacher, DAOUser

    public interface DAOInterface<T,Id extends java.io.Serializable>
    Author:
    Joy Jedidja
